infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a kitchen like it isn't some huge deal.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator in the corner.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a counter. The counter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if] You make out a stove. The stove is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the stove you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a kitchen island. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the kitchen island.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a bedroom.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest drawer.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest drawer contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest drawer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out an antique trunk. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The antique trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The antique trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a king-size bed. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the king-size bed. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]However, the king-size bed, like an empty king-size bed, has nothing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east.

infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
You've entered a backyard.

 You see a set of chairs. You shudder, but continue examining the set of chairs. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the set of chairs.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]However, the set of chairs, like an empty set of chairs, has nothing on it.[end if] You make out a bbq. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the bbq. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You can make out a patio table. [if there is something on the s_9]On the patio table you can make out [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading west. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: living room
infos.desc:
You're now in the living room.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a couch. The couch is typical.[if there is something on the s_5] On the couch you can see [a list of things on the s_5]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a couch in a room.[end if] You see a low table. The low table is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the low table you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a tv. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the tv.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a bathroom.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a toilet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toilet contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The toilet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a bath.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The bath contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The bath is empty![end if] You can make out a sink. The sink is normal.[if there is something on the s_4] On the sink you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: garden
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garden. A standard one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: wooden door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a wooden door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: screen door
infos.desc: The screen door looks noble. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: chest drawer
infos.desc: The chest drawer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: antique trunk
infos.desc: The antique trunk looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]
